<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_936716_enterpris.attachement</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>attachement</name><script><![CDATA[var attachement = Class.create();
attachement.prototype = {
    attach: function(attach_document, number) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
        gr.addQuery("sys_id", attach_document);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            gr.table_name='x_936716_enterpris_governance_items';
			gr.table_sys_id=number;
			gr.update();
        }


    },

    type: 'attachement'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-14 07:29:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>86d220892fff11100f965aab2799b669</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>attachement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture" source="x_936716_enterpris">08ac9f012f2311100f965aab2799b65c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture">08ac9f012f2311100f965aab2799b65c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_86d220892fff11100f965aab2799b669</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-14 07:53:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
